name: My AI (Demo)
description:
My AI is a visual novel about a corrupt machine who wants to be human and the seven people she forces into a game of life and death.

You play as Delaney, an average young man who tries to stay out of trouble. Your decisions lead to the survival or failure of the others taken hostage by the AI girl, nicknamed Dollface.

Can you survive?

It is currently in development, and this is the demo. Feedback from the demo will help with the details of the final product. It is, and will be, completely free.

This demo contains strong language and is best for ages 14+.

More information can be found on the project site here.
